pkgmetadata.longdescription: Analyzing Categorical Time Series // An implementation of several functions for feature extraction in categorical time series datasets. Specifically, some features related to marginal distributions and serial dependence patterns can be computed. These features can be used to feed clustering and classification algorithms for categorical time series, among others. The package also includes some interesting datasets containing biological sequences. Practitioners from a broad variety of fields could benefit from the general framework provided by 'ctsfeatures'.
